title: Chris Trapasso breaks down Bills, 2019 NFL Draft (Football 05/28)
description:
Chris Trapasso joins Will Brinson to break down the Buffalo Bills offseason, discussing who should start at quarterback, what the offense will look like, if expectations should be high and then they dive into some discussion of the 2019 NFL Draft, including who would be the top pick right now and what the biggest strengths of the class are.
